properties.name: accelerate.spring.defaults
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable default settings

properties.name: accelerate.spring.base-packages
properties.description: Comma separaed list of base packages that are included in this application.'accelerate.spring' is included by default'

properties.name: accelerate.spring.logging.profiling
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable profiler logging. Defaults to value of 'accelerate.spring.defaults'

properties.name: accelerate.spring.security.url-patterns.ignored
properties.description: Comma separaed list of URL patterns that should be ignored by Spring Security

properties.name: accelerate.spring.security.url-patterns.allowed
properties.description: Comma separaed list of URL patterns that should be allowed for all by Spring Security

properties.name: accelerate.spring.security.logout.clear-cookies
properties.description: Comma separaed list of cookies that should be cleared on logout

properties.name: accelerate.spring.security.logout.success-url
properties.description: URL to redirect the user to after logout. Spring default is /login?logout

properties.name: accelerate.spring.security.session.max-count
properties.description: Maximum number of sessions to be allowed in the application. Defaults to -1 which is unlimited

properties.name: accelerate.spring.security.session.expired-url
properties.description: URL to redirect the user if the session has expired. Defaults to /login?sessionExpired

properties.name: accelerate.spring.security.actuator.roles
properties.description: Comma separaed list of roles that have access to actuator endpoints. Default is to allow all

properties.name: accelerate.spring.web.path.home
properties.description: Path to the home page of the application. This allows to redirect user from context root / to home page

properties.name: accelerate.spring.web.path.favicon
properties.description: Path to the favicon for the application which will be used on the default index and error pages.

properties.name: accelerate.spring.web.default-view.index
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable default index page. Defaults to value of 'accelerate.spring.defaults'

properties.name: accelerate.spring.web.default-view.error
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable default error page. Defaults to value of 'accelerate.spring.defaults'

properties.name: accelerate.spring.web.api.prefix
properties.description: Path to map the utility Web APIs. Defaults to /webapi/*

properties.name: accelerate.spring.web.api.auth
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable AuthController. Defaults to value of 'accelerate.spring.defaults'

properties.name: accelerate.spring.web.api.cache
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable CacheController. Defaults to value of 'accelerate.spring.defaults'

properties.name: accelerate.spring.web.api.debug
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable DebugController. Defaults to value of 'accelerate.spring.defaults'

properties.name: accelerate.spring.web.api.files
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable FilesController. Defaults to value of 'accelerate.spring.defaults'

properties.name: accelerate.spring.web.api.roles
properties.description: Comma separaed list of roles that should have access to Web APIs. Default is to allow all
